data.comment: The match has started.
The match has started.
Throw-in for Emmen close to the penalty box.
Venlo are whistled for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Venlo in their own half.
Sergio Pena for Emmen gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Venlo have a goal kick.
Venlo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
John Yeboah is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In Emmen Emmen attack through Michael de Leeuw. The finish is off target, however.
Siemen Mulder awards Venlo a goal kick.
John Yeboah is back on his feet again.
Siemen Mulder signals a Emmen throw-in in Venlo's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Venlo goal kick.
Siemen Mulder awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Emmen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Emmen at De Oude Meerdijk.
Venlo to take a throw-in in Emmen territory.
Free kick for Venlo in the half of Emmen.
Chris Kum for Venlo is whistled offside.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Michael de Leeuw for Emmen who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Corner awarded to Emmen.
Emmen's Lorenzo Burnet breaks free at De Oude Meerdijk. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Venlo at De Oude Meerdijk.
Emmen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Michael de Leeuw (Emmen) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Luka Adzic.
Throw-in for Emmen in their own half.
Throw-in Emmen.
Siemen Mulder signals a free kick to Venlo in their own half.
Throw-in for Emmen in their own half.
In Emmen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nils Roseler for Venlo has been booked by Siemen Mulder and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Emmen in the half of Venlo.
Free kick Emmen.
Important block from the Venlo defence as Michael Chacon fires in a strike for Emmen.
Michael Chacon gets his shot on target but fails to score for Emmen.
Siemen Mulder signals a throw-in for Emmen, close to Venlo's area.
Siemen Mulder awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Venlo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Emmen's half?
Free kick for Emmen in their own half.
Siemen Mulder signals a free kick to Emmen.
Emmen drive forward but Marko Kolar is judged offside.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Emmen.
Siemen Mulder signals a free kick to Venlo in their own half.
Siemen Mulder signals a free kick to Venlo.
Venlo advance rapidly upfield but Siemen Mulder blows for offside.
Throw-in for Venlo in the half of Emmen.
Venlo have been awarded a corner by Siemen Mulder.
Venlo surge into the attack at De Oude Meerdijk but Oussama Darfalouâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Emmen at De Oude Meerdijk.
Emmen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Venlo goal kick.
Emmen have a goal kick.
Venlo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Siemen Mulder awards Emmen a goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in Venlo.
Emmen to take a throw-in in Venlo territory.
Emmen pushes forward through Nikolai Laursen, whose finish on goal is saved.
Emmen have a dangerous throw-in.
Emmen's Hilal Ben Moussa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Emmen.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
At De Oude Meerdijk, Venlo are penalized for being offside.
Ball safe as Emmen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Venlo in the half of Emmen.
Throw-in for Venlo at De Oude Meerdijk.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Emmen at De Oude Meerdijk.
Nikolai Laursen scores to make it 1-0 at De Oude Meerdijk.
Can Emmen capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Venlo's half?
Venlo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nikolai Laursen (Emmen) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Emmen.
Emmen are pushing forward but Hilal Ben Moussa's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Venlo goal kick.
Emmen needs to be cautious. Venlo have an attacking throw-in.
Venlo's Thomas Bruns misses with an attempt on goal.
Siemen Mulder awards Emmen a goal kick.
Venlo have been awarded a corner by Siemen Mulder.
Danny Post of Venlo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Emmen at De Oude Meerdijk.
Goal! Emmen extend their lead to 2-0 through Marko Kolar.
Sergio Pena with an assist there.
The match at De Oude Meerdijk has been interrupted briefly for a check on [36], who is down injured.
Hans De Koning (Venlo) is making a first substitution, with Roy Gelmi replacing Chris Kum.
Ball safe as Emmen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Emmen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Venlo's half?
Venlo's Thomas Bruns gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Emmen have a goal kick.
Siemen Mulder signals a free kick to Venlo in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Venlo in Emmen.
Venlo have been awarded a corner by Siemen Mulder.
Emmen needs to be cautious. Venlo have an attacking throw-in.
Emmen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Venlo's [36] is back in action after a slight knock.
Free kick for Emmen in their own half.
Emmen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Venlo.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Emmen.
Siemen Mulder signals a free kick to Venlo in their own half.
Attention is being given to Emmenâ€™s Luka Adzic and play has been suspended briefly.
Free kick for Emmen in their own half.
Luka Adzic for Emmen is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Emmen close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Emmen in Emmen.
Siemen Mulder signals a throw-in for Emmen, close to Venlo's area.
Emmen are coming forward and Marko Kolar gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Corner awarded to Emmen.
Siemen Mulder signals a Emmen throw-in in Venlo's half.
In Emmen, Emmen push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Venlo have a dangerous throw-in.
Venlo make their second substitution with Jerome Sinclair replacing Roel Janssen.
Venlo's Haji Wright gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Emmen defender.
Goal! Nikolai Laursen extends Emmen's lead to 3-0.
Great play from Lorenzo Burnet to set up the goal.
Siemen Mulder awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Venlo in their own half.
Free kick Emmen.
Luka Adzic for Emmen gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Venlo have a goal kick.
Simon Janssen is replacing Haji Wright for Venlo at De Oude Meerdijk.
Ball safe as Venlo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Emmen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Siemen Mulder awards Venlo a goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Venlo close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Emmen.
Ball goes out of play for a Emmen goal kick.
Emmen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Anco Jansen is on a sub for Nikolai Laursen for Emmen.
Siemen Mulder waits before resuming play because Lorenzo Burnet for Emmen is still down.
Lorenzo Burnet is back on the pitch.
Can Venlo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Emmen's half?
Dick Lukkien (Emmen) is making a third change, with Keziah Veendorp replacing the possibly injured Lorenzo Burnet.
Free kick for Emmen in the half of Venlo.
Throw-in high up the field for Emmen in Emmen.
Marko Kolar for Emmen drives towards goal at De Oude Meerdijk. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Emmen have been awarded a corner by Siemen Mulder.
Corner awarded to Venlo.
Emmen awarded a free kick in their own half.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Siemen Mulder signals a free kick to Venlo in their own half.
Siemen Mulder awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Emmen at De Oude Meerdijk.
Can Emmen capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Venlo's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Emmen are coming forward and Glenn Bijl gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Emmen have been awarded a corner by Siemen Mulder.
Goal kick for Venlo at De Oude Meerdijk.
The match is over. Final score 3-0.
